title: xbendin2
description: The `xbendin2` object processes incoming raw MIDI data to extract the Most Significant Byte (MSB) and Least Significant Byte (LSB) of pitch bend messages. These 7-bit values can be combined to form a 14-bit pitch bend value. It also outputs the MIDI channel number if not explicitly set. Note that this object is considered redundant; users are advised to use `bendin` or `else/bend.in` instead.
